entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Sussex
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:02 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sussex Four Corners 6:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
